Title: Part 1: The Secret Map
Text:
Gandalf told me about the Dwarf Expedition and asked for my help.
I should look for Elrond at the great waterfall in the mountains of Rivendell.

Maybe he can help me reading the map.
Otherwise it will be difficult to get into the mountain.
CompleteText: Here is the waterfall Gandalf spoke of. I should speak to Lord Elrond, maybe he'll know what the map is about.
